attributes.action: Paying tax on  UK basic state pension  in Spain
attributes.additional_details: I have to pay 150euros taxation on my basic UK state pension every year and have to leave Spain for six months every year now as I,m a pensioner  I have lived and worked here for 18 yrs  if I stay as resident you are talking at least 500euros a year extra taxation on my basic UK pension
attributes.background: Resident/ Non-Resident taxation on UK and foreign nationals pensioners pension

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
